CCEMRelics:PlaceholderRelic.NAME: Placeholder Energy Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 [E] .

CCEMRelics:Barrel.NAME: Empty Barrel
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, if you have #b50 or less gold, heal #b8 HP.

CCEMRelics:GrapeVine.NAME: Grape Vine
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b4th attack you play applies #b2 Constricted to it's targets.

CCEMRelics:CocoNut.NAME: Coconut
CCEMRelics:CocoNut.FLAVOR: Both healthy for you and unhealthy for your enemies.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup gain #b5 max HP. Whenever you gain #yBlock, deal #b2 damage to a random enemy.

CCEMRelics:HistoryBook.NAME: History Book
CCEMRelics:HistoryBook.FLAVOR: Your entire past and future is written down here.
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards in your draw pile are now ALWAYS sorted in the order they were added to your deck.

CCEMRelics:WarHorn.NAME: War Horn
CCEMRelics:WarHorn.FLAVOR: The only musical instrument to be able to play the Infrasonata.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play #b3 Powers in one turn each combat, #yStun all enemies.

CCEMRelics:Icicle.NAME: Icicle
DESCRIPTIONS: While channelled, #yFrost Orbs give #b1 #yThorns each.

CCEMRelics:StainlessSteel.NAME: Stainless Steel
CCEMRelics:StainlessSteel.FLAVOR: 100 years and not even a scratch can be seen.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yBlock #b3 times in one turn, gain #b5 additional #yBlock.

CCEMRelics:PaperClip.NAME: Paper Clip
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yWeak, the enemy loses #b4 HP.

CCEMRelics:BiPhaseBiplane.NAME: Bi Phase Biplane
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn add a card from your #yExhaust pile into your hand. NL It gains #yPurge and #yccemrelics:Spectral.

CCEMRelics:Moonstone.NAME: Moonstone
CCEMRelics:Moonstone.FLAVOR: A rock older than the gods themselves.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yPower, gain #b2 #yMantra.

CCEMRelics:GreenEgg.NAME: Green Egg
CCEMRelics:GreenEgg.FLAVOR: I would not like them in a Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. NL Whenever you play an #yUpgraded card, #yExhaust it.

CCEMRelics:FryingPan.NAME: Frying Pan
CCEMRelics:FryingPan.FLAVOR: Whoever survives this must have a skull made of steel.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would deal #b30 or more unblocked Attack damage, increase it by #b15.

CCEMRelics:JestersCrown.NAME: Jesters Crown
CCEMRelics:JestersCrown.FLAVOR: For the king of jesters and the jester of kings.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCommon cards deal #b2 more damage and give #b1 more #yBlock.

CCEMRelics:GrindingGear.NAME: Grinding Gear
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b5 cards, your next Attack deals #b2 additional damage.

CCEMRelics:D6.NAME: Philosophers D6
DESCRIPTIONS: You can reroll all potions, relics and card rewards on future reward screens, up to #b8 times in total.

CCEMRelics:PorcelainBowl.NAME: Porcelain Vessel
CCEMRelics:PorcelainBowl.FLAVOR: Don't point out the Elephant in the room.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 additional card at the start of each turn until you take unblocked attack damage each combat.

CCEMRelics:DissonantTune.NAME: Dissonant Tune
CCEMRelics:DissonantTune.FLAVOR: A tune that causes goose bumps and shatters nerves.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b4 turns, ALL enemies lose #b1 #yStrength.

CCEMRelics:Francisca.NAME: Francisca
CCEMRelics:Francisca.FLAVOR: A throwing weapon with immense piercing power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat deal #b10 damage to a random enemy. NL After each elite combat, increase this damage by #b5.

CCEMRelics:FranticForklift.NAME: Frantic Forklift
CCEMRelics:FranticForklift.FLAVOR: A small forklift that is always busy moving cards from a to b.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you shuffle your draw pile, move the top half to your discard pile, NL then #yFetch #b1 card from your discard pile.

CCEMRelics:WrappedPresent.NAME: Unlabeled Present
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup obtain a random #yRare relic and a #b25% chance to obtain a random #yCommon relic. Otherwise heal #b5 HP and gain #b5 max. HP.
Proceed

CCEMRelics:ShadowVeil.NAME: Shadow Veil
DESCRIPTIONS: After the enemy turn, if you have between #b4 and #b12 #yBlock remaining, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to all enemies.

CCEMRelics:MirrorShard.NAME: Mirror Shard
DESCRIPTIONS: During your turn, whenever you lose HP, add an #yEthereal copy of the last #yAttack played this combat into your hand.

CCEMRelics:SpiritSanctuary.NAME: Spirit Sanctuary
CCEMRelics:SpiritSanctuary.FLAVOR: A space for your mind to rest.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b1 #ySafety into your hand.

CCEMRelics:ShortCircuitBoard.NAME: Short Circuit Board
DESCRIPTIONS: Start combat with #b2 less #yFocus. Whenever you #yChannel #yLightning, #yEvoke it twice.

CCEMRelics:TransientCore.NAME: Transient Core
CCEMRelics:TransientCore.FLAVOR: It fills you with power, but you feel the core tugging you, in a direction you can't quite comprehend.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat gain #b6 max. HP. At the end of your turn #rlose #b1 max. HP.

CCEMRelics:FestiveHat.NAME: Festive Hat
CCEMRelics:FestiveHat.FLAVOR: Colorless is the most festive color.
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b3 enemy combats drop a fully #yUpgraded #yColorless card reward.

CCEMRelics:WhiteRose.NAME: White Rose
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now gain #b2 #yThorns at rest sites. (Up to #b3 times).

CCEMRelics:OverlyComfyChair.NAME: Overly Comfy Chair
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the second turn of combat gain #b4 #yBlock. At the start of your third turn heal equal to #b25% of your remaining #yBlock.

CCEMRelics:DerglesHeadphones.NAME: Dergle's Headphones
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you upgrade a card in your deck, heal #b12 HP.

CCEMRelics:TinyMinotavrHorn.NAME: Tiny Minotvur Horn
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn deal #b3 damage to a random enemy for each #b0 or #b1 cost Attack played last turn this combat.

CCEMRelics:TechnogenicHelmet.NAME: Technogenic Helmet
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you fully avoid an enemy attack, your next Attack deals #b2 additional damage.

CCEMRelics:Pendulum.NAME: Pendulum
CCEMRelics:Pendulum.FLAVOR: The pendulum is said to siphon energy from nearby ley lines.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play #b8 or more cards in #b1 turn, gain [E] next turn.

CCEMRelics:Sandal.NAME: Sandal
CCEMRelics:Sandal.FLAVOR: Don't you dare wearing socks with me.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have no Attacks in your hand at the end of your turn, gain #b1 Strength.

CCEMRelics:SpiritsEdge.NAME: Spirits Edge
CCEMRelics:SpiritsEdge.FLAVOR: Once the spirits roamed the forests, but after the spire blight, they vanished.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat deal #b2 damage to a random enemy for each Attack in your deck.

CCEMRelics:OldTooth.NAME: Old Tooth
CCEMRelics:OldTooth.FLAVOR: This definitely did not belong to a Human.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the Start of combat choose a card in your draw pile and put it at the bottom of your draw pile. It gains #yccemrelics:Chain.

CCEMRelics:WhiteNoiseMachine.NAME: White Noise Machine
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you enter a room, the map layout changes.

CCEMRelics:OrganicArmor.NAME: Organic armor
CCEMRelics:OrganicArmor.FLAVOR: Made from 100% organically grown and harvested snake plant hide.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your first turn, convert all of your #yBlock into temporary HP.

CCEMRelics:SelfSharpeningBlade.NAME: Self-Sharpening Blade
DESCRIPTIONS: Colorless Cards deal #b3 extra damage.

CCEMRelics:SoftDrink.NAME: Soft Drink
CCEMRelics:SoftDrink.FLAVOR: Sponsored by the holiday red fat man
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yEnergized.

CCEMRelics:TeddyBear.NAME: Teddy Bear
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a rest site, start the next combat with #b2 #yArtifact.

CCEMRelics:PocketTank.NAME: Pocket Tank
CCEMRelics:PocketTank.FLAVOR: Yes, we did bring it to a gun fight.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you end your turn with #b30 or more #yBlock, deal #b12 damage to the enemy with the most HP.

CCEMRelics:LatexGloves.NAME: Latex Gloves
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw #b1 additional card. Whenever you draw the last card in your draw pile, draw #b1 additional card at the start of your next turn.

CCEMRelics:FakeTeeth.NAME: Fake Teeth
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a power, apply #b1 #yWeak to ALL enemies.

CCEMRelics:HeliumBalloon.NAME: Helium Balloon
DESCRIPTIONS: The draw pile is sorted by cost. Lowest at the top.

CCEMRelics:CanOfSoda.NAME: Can of Soda
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, Gain #b1 Max HP for each Common card and Starter card in your deck.

CCEMRelics:HedgeMaize.NAME: Hedge Maize
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a #y? room, heal 5 HP.

CCEMRelics:FiftyFTOfRope.NAME: 50ft of Rope
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a #ySkill. ALL copies of that #ySkill gain #yccemrelics:Chain
